user_query: I'm planning a trip to Europe with my friends and we need to exchange 500 Euros to British Pounds. Can you provide us with the exchange rate, including the buy and sell fees? Also, let us know the withdrawal fee in percentage. Furthermore, we would like to have some Chuck Norris jokes to entertain ourselves during the trip.

TaskList.description: Fetch the current exchange rate for Euros to British Pounds along with buy and sell fees.
Retrieve the withdrawal fee for exchanging Euros to British Pounds in percentage.
Gather some Chuck Norris jokes for entertainment during the trip.
